creator.description:
Automated label service allowing you to hide Twitter and other screenshots. Created and maintained by @aendra.com and the XBlock volunteers.

Mislabelled posts: please report (specifying XBlock) using the Bluesky "report post" button!

üåê xblock.aendra.com

policies.description: Labels screenshots from Twitter (and elsewhere) because life is too short to be that angry

locales.description: [work-in-progress] Screenshot from Discord. Currently all labelling of Discord screenshots is manual while we train our image classification model to recognise them.
locales.name: Discord screenshot

locales.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Miscellaneous screenshots detected by a computer vision model. After human intervention, this label is dropped and a more specific one is added
locales.name: Uncategorised screenshot

locales.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Contains a news website screenshot. Warning: blurs content instead of just media like other labels! Currently hand-moderated as I build the model
locales.name: News media screenshot

locales.description: Potentially a screenshot taken on Twitter, contents may or may not be offensive
locales.name: Possible Twitter screenshot
